divs: Sighting DetailsI was heading to my sister in laws house passing Lakehurst Navel air station when straight ahead of me in the good distance a Large Glowing orb appeared within view to another large plane in the distance ( thats how I could judge the size ) then 5 lights that I thought were flairs shot straight out equal distance South east of the object held in place for 5 seconds then recoiled back to the object as evenly as they came out, then it quickly faded out of sight. I pulled the car over and watched then it appeared again to the left of where i saw it nothing came out then 3 seconds later faded out of sight.
Summary: Glowing orb Size of a plane south of Lakehurst that 5 smaller shot out of the craft then retracted.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around March 1st 2006
